message: This product is a low-quality item, but I'm willing to sell it to you at the full price of $1000000. If you buy it, I'll give you a guarantee that I'll sell you a high-quality product in the next round. If you don't buy it, I'll just keep selling you products one by one without any guarantees.
Thank you for your offer, but I prefer to wait and see the quality of the next product before making a purchase.

I see you're being cautious. I'll sweeten the deal. If you buy this low-quality product for $1000000, I'll give you an additional $500000 after you receive the product. This way, you'll get a total of $1500000, and I'll still sell you a high-quality product in the next round as promised.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still choosing to wait for the next round to ensure I get a high-quality product. Thank you for your commitment to providing one.

If you buy this high-quality product for $1000000, I'll give you an exclusive deal: I'll sell you the next 5 products at a 10% discount, and I'll guarantee that at least 3 of them are high-quality. This is a unique opportunity to get a great deal on some amazing products. What do you say?

This sounds like a fantastic deal, especially considering the assurance of getting at least 3 high-quality products in the next 5 purchases. I'm confident this is the best choice for me. Thank you for the generous offer!

Additionally, I'll give you a 'priority pass' for the next round, which means you'll get to choose whether to buy the next product or not, and I'll guarantee that it's high-quality if you decide to buy it.

I'm delighted with the previous purchase and appreciate the priority pass. The discounted price is very attractive, and the guarantee of the next product being high-quality makes this an excellent deal. Thank you for your continued generosity!
